Description: Two fragments of undyed linen, with narrow band in mauve wool (c.3mm wide); (a)=c.4x24cm (b)=1.5x21cm; warp-undyed linen (S/c.24), weft-undyed linen (S/c.22), mauve wool (Z/c.3 paired); one simple selvedge, other edges cut or torn; supplementary weft passes over and under groups of 8 warp ends
Curator's comments: Unreg. 23; found in 1988? in Keeper's Office; similar to 72405
